item.title: Sdk Event Sourcing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Software Development Kit (SDK) SDK stands for Software Development Kit: the tools and software to develop application through a specific platform. SDK provides libraries, document, templates, code sample, debugging, supportive documentation or additional document for developers to integrate into their software/ application. SDK can also be a combination of many APIs under the form of libraries to interact with the operating system. Let’s take a cellphone for an example. Every cellphone has an operating system with programmed API, and many underlying connected libraries.
